item.title: Education
item.description:
Postgraduate Research

As a member of the Computing Education Research Group, in the School of Computing, my research focuses on student engagement with disciplinary practices.

BSc in Computer Science (1st class)

The course covered a variety of modules including the study of: Java, C, Algorithms, Embedded Micro-Systems and Intelligent Systems.

Developing Management Skills Programme

A professional development course in management skills that took place over 6 months. Topics included: effective team leadership, dispute resolution and project management.

Associate Teacher Accreditation Programme

A professional development course in higher education teaching. It included discussions on theoretical approaches to teaching, socio-economics and political issues in higher education. Extended essays and teaching observations were a required part of the assessment. Following this course, I applied for and have been awarded “Associate Fellowship of the Higher Education Academy”.
